mapper.sql: ADMIN_ID, CODE, NAME, STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, OPERATOR, UPDATE_TIME, CREATOR_ID

SELECT count(*) FROM tom_admin where 1=1 and code!=#{superCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and admin_id!=0
and INSTR(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

SELECT count(*) FROM tom_admin e join tom_admin_roles lol on e.admin_id=lol.admin_id left join tom_role tr on tr.role_id=lol.role_id where 1=1
and INSTR(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

SELECT count(*) FROM tom_admin where 1=1 and code!=#{superCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='Y' and admin_id!=0
and INSTR(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0

SELECT * FROM tom_admin where 1=1 and code!=#{superCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status='Y' and admin_id!=0
and INSTR(name,#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})>0 order by update_time desc limit #{startNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{endNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT e.*,tr.role_id FROM tom_admin e join tom_admin_roles lol on e.admin_id=lol.admin_id left join tom_role tr on tr.role_id=lol.role_id where e.ADMIN_ID= #{adminId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
